Dear all,
Hope you all are safe and well.
"Hacking just means building something quickly or testing the boundaries of what can be done. "  
                       -Mark Zuckerberg

Hacking is not a crime, it's a profession till the time one plays with it safely. There are always boundaries to be maintained, that's the rule every professional obey. Here at Ahmedabad University, the IEEE WIE Student branch is providing you with a webinar that would introduce you to those boundaries. 
 Learning from the finest in the field,Niralee Chavda. In the 90 minutes of conversation withNiralee Chavdalets get some inside secrets from someone who has good experience of corporate-level training in Infrastructure and security. Having 4 years of experience in Networking and server. Alongside being a Red hat certified Trainer, she has had the opportunity to work with technicians from all-round engineering disciplines has allowed her to troubleshoot complex system-level issues adding more to her bag of experience. Her job includes getting freshers job-ready and onboard for industry project work. This would be an advantage for all attendees to learn from the perspective of the corporate world.For more information about the speaker kindly refer to the pdf attached.

This being an opportunity which one can hardly miss, register yourself and save a seat. Learning these things without guidance can be a hassle. For everyone who wants to gain any knowledge, this just could be the kickstart to an amazing journey.
All relevant details are as follows
Speaker: Niralee Chavda
Date: May 13th, 2020
Day: Wednesday
Time: 3:00 PM to 4:30PM
Registration Link: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeOsUJQKRMMekN3tk7xYrCXCt1xGyXXHA7wSikY-ok5Xc0CLg/viewform?usp=sf_link

**Are you looking for Jobs/Internships?**
Or **Are you hiring Interns/Full Time Employees?**

We are in the middle of the biggest crisis of our generation. Our decisions today will shape the world for years to come. They will define not only our healthcare systems but also our work, leisure, travel, empathy and learning.

**What we are doing?**
To create new opportunities for those who have lost jobs and internships, Opportunity Cell is crowd-sourcing from the best and brightest around the world.

**What you have to do?**
 Comment **Hiring** (if you are currently hiring full time employees and/or interns. ) 
 Comment **Looking for Internship/ Jobs** (if you are a student or a professional searching for Internship or Job.)
 _Please do share among your network! May be it can help someone._ 

**We will share the Document compiling all the available opportunities to the Email IDs in every 2 Days.
**

Dear Sir/Madam,

Technology landscape has emerged out, in the past few weeks with value proposition for online meetings and video conferencing. Most of us are using available communication/networking platforms. These platforms share a majority in terms of usage but there are issues of data security, data breaching. Servers used for data storage are in different countries as they are not indigenous. Looking at this situation at a glance, there is an urge to create an Indigenous App as a solution.

Hence, Bharatiya Shikshan Mandal Yuva Ayam, Research For Resurgence Foundation and IIT Ropar jointly organizes Mobile Based Cloud Video Conferencing Competition to develop indigenous platform working on the basis of Data Pooling with no or minimal Dependence on large server, Beta version demo for minimum 50 users.

Winner will be awarded 5,00,000/-( Five Lakh Rupees Only) along with Development Support
3 Runner ups will get Internship from IIT Ropar
Last Date For :
Proposal Submission: 15th May 2020
Beta version Demo: 31st May 2020

For more details visit : http://rfrfoundation.org/competitions/


PFA:- https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ibJk62Mo3t_kS_kntN9-AzN7KFm7mKHE/view?usp=sharing

Regards
AICTE
